snippet.title: Resident Evil 2: Source Demo V.1
snippet.description:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/resident-evil-2-source

First, ancient demo of my mod.

Download -

V 1.04 Standalone (ModDB): https://www.moddb.com/mods/resident-evil-2-source/downloads/resident-evil-2-source-v-103-standalone

V 1.04 Standalone (GDrive): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kTBh5pGZDOOH91zJFGJBy3DrAOkRegBA/view?usp=sharing

V 1.04 Standalone (Dropbox): https://www.dropbox.com/s/zcdsdy8kg91jka5/Resident%20Evil%202%20Source%201_04_Standalone.rar?dl=0

V 1.04 Standalone (Internet Archive) https://archive.org/details/resident-evil-2-source-v-1-04-standalone

Older versions:

V 1.03 Standalone [With fixed bat file] (GDrive): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GSxtlZfPUN6Ej_kzxAOGmDcUMaKz6ZK_/view?usp=sharing

V 1.02 (ModDB): https://www.moddb.com/mods/resident-evil-2-source/downloads/resident-evil-2-source-demo-v-11

Only Steam and Source SDK Base 2013 Singleplayer are required to play. Installation: Extract the RE2 folder and move it to C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods OR C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods if you are using a 64 bit OS, and restart Steam if it's already running. Source SDK Base 2013 Singleplayer will automatically install upon launch if it isn't already installed.
